revisions.rev:
{{tooshort|date=April 2010}} {{Infobox artist discography | Artist = [[Creedence Clearwater Revival]] | Image = | Caption = | Alt = | Studio = 7 | Live = 2 | Compilation = 14 | Video = | Music videos = | Tribute = | EP = | Singles = 15 | B-sides = 14 | Soundtrack = | References = Yes }} The [[discography]] of [[People of the United States|American]] [[Rock music|rock]] band [[Creedence Clearwater Revival]], who released their first album and singles in July 1968,{{cite album-notes |title=Chronicle: The 20 Greatest Hits |albumlink=Chronicle, Vol. 1 |artist=[[Creedence Clearwater Revival]] featuring [[John Fogerty]] |year=1991 |format=CD liner |publisher=[[Fantasy Records]] |publisherid=FCD-CCR2-2 |location=[[Berkeley, California]], [[United States]]}} includes 7 [[studio album]]s, 2 [[live album]]s, 14 [[compilation album]]s, and 15 [[Single (music)|single]]s. The group, who was only active for 4 years, has sold more than 30 million albums and singles in the United States alone,{{cite web |url=http://www.riaa.com/goldandplatinumdata.php?table=SEARCH |title=Gold & Platinum Searchable Database |work=[[Recording Industry Association of America|Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA)]] |format=PHP}} Type in "Creedence Clearwater Revival" under ''Artist'' to see seach results. and has charted in multiple countries throughout the world. It is worthy of note that CCR holds the record for the act with the most singles to reach #2 on the [[Billboard Hot 100]] without ever scoring a #1 single, with five.{{cite web |url=http://www.billboard.com/specials/hot100/charts/most-no2s-wo1s.shtml |title=Most No. 2 Hits Without Reaching No. 1 By Artist |work=[[Billboard Magazine]] |format=PHP}} ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2" width="250"| Title
